channel.title: CVE Feed for Foliovision: Making the web work for you -- FV Flowplayer Video Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Foliovision: Making the web work for you -- FV Flowplayer Video Player

item.title: CVE-2024-29122|2024-07-05T17:22:12.332Z -- foliovision%3A%20making%20the%20web%20work%20for%20you -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Foliovision: Making the web work for you FV Flowplayer Video Player allows Stored XSS.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.41.7212.

item.title: CVE-2024-22299|2024-03-27T05:59:22.741Z -- foliovision%3A%20making%20the%20web%20work%20for%20you -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Foliovision: Making the web work for you FV Flowplayer Video Player allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.41.7212.

item.title: CVE-2024-29122|2024-03-19T14:46:35.878Z -- foliovision%3A%20making%20the%20web%20work%20for%20you -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Foliovision: Making the web work for you FV Flowplayer Video Player allows Stored XSS.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.41.7212.
